project.description: This project used to publish mindspore website imgae to location cn-north-4, this is 1th step build base image for mindspore; the base image is used for website: "https://github.com/opensourceways/infra-mindspore/tree/master/applications/website"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION="v-1.0.0" STATUS="0" PROJECT_NAME="mindspore-website-publish-02"
cd $WORKSPACE if [ -e variable.txt ]; then rm -f variable.txt fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) echo "INPUT=$IMAGE_VERSION" > variable.txt echo "STATUS_CODE=$STATUS" >> variable.txt fi echo "###############################################################################" echo "GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT":${GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT} echo "GIT_COMMIT":${GIT_COMMIT} if [ ${GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT} == ${GIT_COMMIT} ];then sed -i "s|STATUS_CODE=0|STATUS_CODE=1|g" ./variable.txt echo "Nothing to commit, Working tree clean and exit." exit 0 fi echo "###############################################################################"
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
#sed -i "s|registry.npmmirror.com|repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/npm|" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "s|npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com|npm ci --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "s|RUN pnpm install|RUN npm i --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com|" ./Dockerfile
sed -i '17i RUN npm cache clean -f && npm i --registry=https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/npm/ && npm run build' ./Dockerfile sed -i '18,19d' ./Dockerfile cat -n ./Dockerfile
echo "building website server" docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website:$IMAGE_VERSION
